name: Multi-Turret Mayhem
description:
Put your multitasking skills to the test in Multi-Turret Mayhem!

Left Turret

    -W to shoot

    -A and D to rotate

Right Turret

    -UP to shoot

    -LEFT and RIGHT to rotate

Created By:

    Kyle Wong

    Tyler Gemora

    Jake Smith

    Richard But

    Sci-Fi Textures: by Marcelo Fernandez
